Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory667.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "We're here, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having escaped the turbulence of the transport craft, you take a deep breath as you step onto the ground. Looking up at the massive city, you are still amazed by its magnificence.'}
{3: 'After the battle with Echo, Cervantes left Constellia in the hands of Babylonia with barely an instruction.'}
{3: 'Since then, WGAA has stationed a team in Constellia. Occasionally, they would discover something new...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Why did they send us to Constellia on such short notice?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's find out.", 3: '12'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Commandant—over here!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'An energetic Construct with pink hair waves at you on the landing pad.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Ayla is cheerful as always.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla runs toward you as you speak.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "You're right on time! Quickly! We'll walk and talk.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Gesturing the Gray Ravens and you to follow her, Ayla hurries away with a smile still on her face.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'We found a new, special "gallery" in Constellia that only opens at a specific season!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Care to guess what season it is?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Ayla looks even more joyous upon Lucia's response."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Ta-da—it's SPRING!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Spring? It's surely a romantic season.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Of course! I heard that back in the Golden Age, people liked to go hiking in spring for romantic dates!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'We believe this gallery was themed after spring, which is why it activated automatically not long ago...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is that the one?', 4: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'While you walk, that mysterious gallery themed after spring appears before you.'}
{2: 'It does look beautiful.', 3: '49'}
{3: 'The exterior of the gallery extends outward in layers like a blossoming rose. A flock of unknown bionic birds chirps as they fly past the building.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'What lovely birds!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I did some research on the gallery. Those birds are called skylarks, and they represent love and courage!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'So, what do you need Gray Raven for? Do you want us to bring it down so you can inspect its interior?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hey! Don't be so impulsive!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ayla stops Lee from further assembling his gun before placing her hands behind her back and looking at you.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Hehe! Actually, what I need is more test subjects!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Test subjects?', 3: '67'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'This maze seems to be testing the rapport between two people. WGAA has sent many people in there, but no one has passed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'But I immediately thought about Gray Raven when it comes to great rapport!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I happened to find out about your schedule through... a special means, and Celica immediately assigned you the mission.', 4: '2'}
{3: "It's true that we haven't had any urgent missions lately..."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I even prepared a small surprise for you, Commandant—look!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "It's the Shark-speare costume, Spring Maze Special Edition!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: '"Who\'s that descending from the sky? Shark-speare! Leading its friends out of the maze—without fear!" See? I even came up with the slogan!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Treat it as a vacation! There are plenty of interesting sights to visit in Constellia!', 4: '2'}
{2: "It's nice to take a break sometimes.", 3: '88', 4: 'We still have work to do.', 5: '91'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're right, Commandant. We haven't been on vacation together in a while.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Hey! Don't you lie to me! Celica told me how free you are!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You haven't really taken a break lately, Commandant. Why not use this opportunity to relax?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'The entrance is right here!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Above the entrance are the words "Looking Glass Vows" forged in metal. An adorable metal fence stands in your way, on which a small skylark perches and sings.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'You can claim your "Looking Glass Pass" here. That\'s your ticket inside.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "You can only claim a limited amount of passes every day, so don't waste your chances!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ayla chuckles cheekily before pushing open the door to the gallery.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Well then, Commandant... welcome to Looking Glass Vows, where the skylarks sing all night!', 4: '2'}
